title: S&P 500, Dow Jones, and Nasdaq futures show little movement as investors brace for critical inflation data and Federal Reserve rate decision
description: US stock futures remained largely flat as investors awaited crucial inflation data that could influence the Federal Reserve's next interest-rate decision. While job cuts increased, weekly jobless claims fell, presenting mixed signals for the labor market. Tra…
content: US stock futures were largely unchanged Thursday night(November 4) as investors braced for critical inflation data that could shape the Federal Reserves upcoming interest-rate decision. Futures linke… [+2050 chars]
